quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Dream big and dare to fail.
Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
The future depends on what you do today.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Failure is not the opposite of success; it’s part of success.
Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.

verses.text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord.
This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Let all that you do be done in love.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
The joy of the Lord is your strength.
Come to me, all who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love Him.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
Faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
Do to others as you would have them do to you.
The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.

biology.text: DNA is like a blueprint of life.
The cell is the basic unit of all living organisms.
Adaptation is the key to survival.
Photosynthesis powers nearly all life on Earth.
Evolution is the fundamental principle of biology.
Life began in the oceans billions of years ago.
Genes carry the instructions for life.
The human body is made up of trillions of cells working together.
Oxygen is essential for most life forms on Earth.
The heart pumps blood to sustain life.
Enzymes are nature's catalysts, speeding up reactions.
The diversity of life is a testament to evolution.
Proteins are the building blocks of life.
Ecosystems maintain the delicate balance of life.
The brain is the most complex organ in the human body.
Microorganisms play a vital role in the ecosystem.
The food chain represents the flow of energy in nature.
Symbiosis shows how organisms interact for mutual benefit.
Cells divide to grow, repair, and reproduce.
The study of biology helps us understand life in all its forms.
